highlights: 为您的猫咪设计的奢华家具:我们优雅的猫咪公寓塔拥有不同层次,柔软的记忆泡沫垫,立方体的洞穴和一个悬挂球玩具,使其成为理想的私人空间和真正甜蜜的家园,让您的猫咪朋友休息、玩耍、保持活跃并满足他们的日常需求。
超坚固和节省空间:我们的猫咪游戏塔的紧凑尺寸确保您可以节省空间,同时为您的猫咪提供所需的生活和游戏空间。 超级坚固的结构，方形底座和坚固的绳状抓挠柱确保家具的稳定性，同时保护您的猫咪免受倾倒危险，无论它们的活跃如何。
适合猫咪的家庭和游乐场: 每个栖息地上的毛绒靠垫和我们猫树的宽敞的立方体公寓为您的猫咪提供一个完美的午睡休息室。 不同级别为您的宠物玩耍和跳跃提供多种选择,悬挂球玩具会娱乐数小时。
质量上乘,简单组装:我们的猫爬塔采用专门优质材料和耐用的中密度纤维板木材制成,经久耐用。 而且,您无需成为专业人士,因为它拥有一个无忧的旋入式组装,随附的说明书可帮助您分步!

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHZUQEZAOSRKUJ7DE774DE7XAZ2Q
reviews.review:
\n This cat tree offered the size and perch options I was looking for! Plus I dislike the fully carpeted models and this is way more attractive to look at. I only took one star off for the sharp corners on the cubby portion and it didn\'t include a stabilizing strap. I noticed the corners before I ordered so I also got corner protectors and problem solved!
It\'s sturdy and roomy enough for my 16 lb. Maine Coon and I like that it has one section of scratch post tall enough for him to fully stretch and scratch. The top perch is the largest and he lays on it with legs dangling but that is what he prefers anyway.
My petite lady loves the cubby but even the big guy gets in there. This is where I keep their toys too.
Happy Camper Cats!!!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF6XG3KF2NYZA5HGFL4OBDDQFAIQ
reviews.review_title: It\'s nice, but I have durability questions
reviews.review: \n  It\'s attractive, it\'s got decent construction quality. I do have some concerns about the quality of the scratchers though. About 2 months in and Maude has thoroughly destroyed one of the posts, and is working her way through another. So I could wish that the sissal was more durable.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGCX6F5VO2SDN3R2AE5FMLKMTMBQ
reviews.review_title: Looks great, easy to clean and sturdy. Cat approved
reviews.review: \n  Great buy. The cat definitely approves.  Been months and he still actually plays with the ball things.  Hardly wiggles at all when he jumps up there and he’s 15 lbs.  The cat box thing is actually big enough for him to go in, and he does.  The other ones on standard cat trees were pointless because he couldn’t fit. This is awesome because you can wash the pillow parts, they don’t come off too easily so the cat doesn’t slide around, and therefore doesn’t hold any stench like standard cat trees.  Glad I tried this!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFZ3WAF7272PCFSOQJHZCJTI5DUQ
reviews.review: \n  Absolutely love this cat tree. I hate the carpeted ones as they end up looking so dingy and didn\'t fit in with my mid-century decor. I wanted something to blend in with my furniture and not stick out like a sore thumb but was also tall enough so the cat could escape the dogs. He loves this tree, and I was even surprised he crawled into the little box (he\'s a fairly large cat). Easy to put together, sturdy base and I get compliments all the time on it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGOAQMNNBRECPQH76WHETZ2EVGHA
reviews.review: \n  The surface is too slippery as is for a cat to like it. I ended up putting carpet on all the wood surfaces and it\'s a little better. I doubt your cat will go in the box unless you put treats in there. The little toy on bungee cords is pretty worthless too. I would definitely buy something else or make your own. It does look nice though so if you don\'t have a cat and just want to waste some space go for it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGDVLUJUWCNN62WSY5LJ23AHUJTA
reviews.review: \n  Our cat loves this perch because of the height for looking out of the window and watching birds! We love this perch because of the removable/washable pads and the stylish look of it in the room (hard to find with a cat tree!) Highly recommend!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH465W2QZTCYK2ZK52EGEBZCUERA
reviews.review: \n  So far we really like this tree. My cats love lying on the pillows and it seems very stable. I changed it around a bit to fit our needs and I love that it has no carpet.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGGJKMPRWJNSQMVU3X76KY2N3D6A
reviews.review_title: My Disco Dixie Kitty likes it!
reviews.review:
\n It was pretty easy to assemble and is very sturdy.

My cat still would rather sleep in the basket next to the tree than in the tree itself. However once she learned how to jump from the top platform to my bed one night at 1:46 am, she now knows how to get my attention for an early morning snack\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHIEKHNWPQX6SPYAIS4XFSZSPXOA
reviews.review: \n  I did a lot of research trying to find a cat condo that is sturdy and easy to clean and was glad I came across this 1. Very stable, the pads can be removed to be washed in the machine, and it keeps my cat Mochi entertained when I’m at work.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHSIKKW27TCVSBYMLEO2ZYTPV4DA
reviews.review:
\n The instructions were very vague, just pictures no guidance. The padding is minimal, there are 4 pcs of faux fur pads that have 2 Velcro strips to hold them on. The only good thing about this is that you can remove them and wash them.

The size is good for our 3 cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH6FM56VK36ZEBNTOCBBC42QU6YQ
reviews.review: \n  This cat tower is very cheaply made. I purchased this brand over the Vesper to save a little money. Bad idea! The one I was sent even had the holes drilled in the wrong spots so it could not even be put together properly. Had to send it back and will be ordering the more expensive brand\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHMHOBJV7735PTCJWT6J7E3ENTFQ
reviews.review:
\n I would have rated this product high, except the company didn’t send any wooden platforms!
The delivery was surprising quick, the scratch post and washable mats were packaged nicely in the box but no wooden platforms. My cat seemed intrigued with the available contents but probably wondered why it was never assembled.

Probably not going to purchase from this company again.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGKQB65BGA3NHYHEC2LJ3XSV7U3Q
reviews.review: \n  I wanted a cat tree that went with the aesthetic of my apartment and this was it! It was very easy to put together. My cat warmed up to it immediately. About a month later he still sleeps on it every night!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHQRGM37BAFFHRRZPY5G4UG5V62A
reviews.review_title: Got wobbly after a month; not worth the money
reviews.review: \n  Assembly was slightly difficult because the instructions were off and didn’t match the given parts exactly. After a month of my cats using it, it became incredibly wobbly. Not worth the money.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH6A4TDLAL3Y36OUYQD6PSPUEPKA
reviews.review:
\n Nothing like you\'re cat getting zoomies, running up on this, and then almost falls off hanging on for dear life like Simba from The Lion King.

Other than that, super cute and my cat who is full grown can fit comfortably.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AENBDQS42PITJHP5PPFWWV7XVDHQ
reviews.review: \n  finally a cat condo that is not an eyesore!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGBTUYUYEYYA6AZLRGBTDPKKX5TQ
reviews.review: \n  Instructions not complete, you need to measure the scratch posts to determine accurate assembly.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHY6CMVHW7E7NJFCS6J62OZFQFNA
reviews.review: \n  Great product. No doubt\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFBRKBVAGLAPBKKTJ5XV7SYX4MKQ
reviews.review: 报告滥用情况

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHNAYNX2SU53DJ3QIQXMITO3E5OA
reviews.review: \n  Really cute, I just with the front pole was in the back, but it\'s cute anyway. My cat loves it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEPWDSUBBM3PAEMGS6ZHBIXOLVWQ
reviews.review: \n  Looks nice very modern but wobbles a lot\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF55SAQQYG7EO53LYTD5V44ETWNQ
reviews.review: \n  Love!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYCW4GVCDIOGBWG3W3VYYU5UVJQ
reviews.review_title: Directions show pudding the bottom boards the wrong way but Excellent kitten tree!
reviews.review: 报告滥用情况

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEHI3PEWTYSJSY5UNKVNTWGYYBTQ
reviews.review: \n  My cat is more than 10 lbs and can stretch up to 3 ft so this is perfect. Compared to cat towers that are made of compressed saw dust, this is solid plywood so it is heavy and clearly sturdy. Not to mention that it has detachable soft touch furry cushions and not glued on surface that turns into a fur trap horror. Neat and tidy all round and is a strongly recommended purchase for big cat owners. It is unfortunate it is not 6 ft, but I cannot imagine this quality and heavy woodwork would be possible to get even larger/higher.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFZAJUNGQNUQ2QQBXAZZUNRGEJQA
reviews.review_title: Had mish-mash of parts that don’t fit together!
reviews.review:
\n Received wrong parts. The short posts were taller than that stated on the parts sheet 39cm instead of 20.5, the longer posts were 45cm instead of 38. Base was incorrect. It had 4 holes drilled, instead of the described three. Received 2 of part C and no part D. Also missing both round rugs (part L). We were able to make it work with a couple pieces of scrap 2x4s we already had but will have to go purchase a couple of carpet tiles to cover the wood. This was an epic fail!

That all being said, the materials were of good quality, but again, not all of the correct parts.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG5A64QPS45M6ZFGMSRNFRGC5UWA
reviews.review: \n  Very easy for me to assemble, biggest thing is to lay everything out first then start. Fender\'s 14 pounds or there about and this has held up wonderfully. He can\'t shake it and it doesn\'t creak under his weight.\n
